Attacks.Name: Hurricane
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, this character gains power equal to the damage dealt. If a wild is rolled, the target gains the Stagger special condition.

Attacks.Name: Aerial Ace
Attacks.Effect: This attack cannot be blocked or modified by defense rolls.

Attacks.Name: Brave Bird
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, this character suffers 1 damage.

Superpowers.Name: Keen Eye
Superpowers.Effect: This character cannot have its attack dice modified by an enemy character.

Superpowers.Name: Tailwind
Superpowers.Effect: All allied characters within Range 3 of this character increase their movement to L until the end of their next activation.

Attacks.Name: Feather Dance
Attacks.Effect: Choose an enemy character within range. That character subtracts 1 die from its attack rolls until the end of its next activation.

Superpowers.Name: Keen Eye
Superpowers.Effect: This character cannot have its attack dice modified by an enemy character.
